sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Button } from 'react-scroll' import { InfoContainer, InfoWrapper, InfoRow, Column1, TextWrapper, TopLine, Heading, Subtitle, BtnWrap, Column2, ImgWrap, Img, } from "./InfoElements"; const InfoSection = ({lightBg, id, imgStart, topLine, lightText, headline, darkText, description, buttonLabel }) => { return ( <> {topLine} {headline} {description} ) } export default InfoSection
